short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Giraffe Chrome Extension enables you to easily curate helpful content for your workspace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Giraffe Chrome Extension brings our AI assistant GiraffeBot to your browser, helping you to automatically curate content and resources for your team - best of all, your browser activity and data is completely secured and is never sent to our servers! You'll need a verified Giraffe workspace and account to properly use this extension. Need an account? Head to https://app.getgiraffe.io/sign-up to get started!
